list_definition.definition: renewable resources replace themselves naturally or can be controlled so that they can be used without completely running out

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Renewable resources, such as wind, water, and sunlight, will never run out.

list_definition.definition: a renewable agreement or contract can be extended for a further period of time after it ends

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The post will initially be for one year, renewable for a further two years subject to satisfactory performance.
